name: Bombay-Taco-Co.
address: Shop 08, Ground Floor, Rafi Mansion, Guru Nanak Park, Pali Hill, Pali Hill, Mumbai, Mumbai
description: Bombay Taco Co. is a F&B-Casual Dining outlet that serves up delicious Mexican-Indian fusion cuisine. The restaurant offers a wide variety of tacos, burritos, quesadillas, and other Mexican-inspired dishes. The menu also features a selection of Indian-inspired dishes such as curries, tandoori, and biryani. The restaurant has a vibrant atmosphere with colorful decor and upbeat music. The staff is friendly and attentive, and the food is always fresh and flavorful. Bombay Taco Co. is the perfect spot for a casual lunch or dinner with friends and family.
